page.title: 20A Typical Sunday, Otford.
page.content: I get up about 8.0 am. and have breakfast: Coco Pops, milk and a cup of tea and toast. Then I get dressed, washed and brush my hair. About 9.40 am I go outside and wait for Delia to pick me up and take me to church where we both sing in the choir. Then we get robed and maybe ring the bells. Then we process down and have the service. After the service we are driven home and I quite often go on to Delia's to play. I go home at 5.30 pm. and have tea. It is usually a snack because we have Sunday Dinner at lunchtime. I go in the car with my mum to pick up Delia and we go to church. The service is much the same as the morning's. When I get home I watch television until bedtime.
